FuncDef: This command configures the Route Distinguisher (RD) component that will be signaled in the MP-BGP NLRI for L2VPN and EVPN families. This value will be used for BGP-AD, BGP VPLS and BGP multi-homing NLRI, if these features are configured.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address. Values-ip-addr: a.b.c.d.

Specifies the AS number. Values-as-number	: 1 to 65535
ext-comm-val: 		0 to 4294967295.
The system generates an RD for the service according to the IP address and range configured in the bgp-auto-rd-range command.
